name: Black Bear
description: A large, powerful mammal with thick, dark fur and sharp claws, known for its strong physical presence.
memorable: Its keen sense of smell makes it a formidable opponent, able to detect hidden threats.
goals: Foraging for food such as berries, fish, and small animals, as well as defending territory and cubs.
relations: Typically solitary but may be found near cubs or other wildlife.
environment: Forests, mountainous areas, and regions with abundant food sources.
strengths: Impressive physical strength and high climbing ability.
weaknesses: Low armor class and lack of ranged attack or magical abilities.
attacks: Multiattack capability, swiping with claws and biting.
most_powerful_ability: Keen Smell grants advantage on Perception checks based on smell.
senses: Passive Perception 13, indicating good alertness to surroundings.
skills: Proficient in perception, enhancing its environmental awareness.
additional_information: Can stand on hind legs to appear more intimidating.
Not inherently aggressive but will defend cubs or food sources fiercely.
Very low Intelligence score indicates poor problem-solving abilities.
Average Dexterity provides no benefits in agility.
Relies on strength in close combat with effective melee attacks.
